trader_macdfix

(PECL trader >= 0.2.0)

trader_macdfix — Moving Average Convergence/Divergence Fix 12/26

说明

trader_macdfix ( array $real [, int $signalPeriod ] ) : array

参数

real

浮点数数组。

signalPeriod

Smoothing for the signal line (nb of period). Valid range from 1 to 100000.

返回值

Returns an array with calculated data or false on failure.
